# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(NBT LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_library(NBT STATIC "")
set_target_properties(NBT PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "NBT")
set_target_properties(NBT PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(NBT PRIVATE
    include
    src
)
target_include_directories(NBT SYSTEM PRIVATE
    C:/Users/mcwit/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/b/binarystream/2.3.2/8e3d87e137954c31b6acdb2d78a3e28f/include
    C:/Users/mcwit/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/z/zlib/v1.3.1/95786712bac941e795afa187a68143a4/include
)
target_compile_definitions(NBT PRIVATE
    NOMINMAX
    UNICODE
)
target_compile_options(NBT PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/EHsc>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/EHsc>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/utf-8>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/utf-8>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/W4>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/W4>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/O2>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/O2>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Ob3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Ob3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(CMAKE_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(NBT PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(CMAKE_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
    target_compile_options(NBT PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(NBT PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(CMAKE_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
    target_compile_options(NBT PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(NBT PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(NBT PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(CMAKE_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(NBT PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(NBT PRIVATE -Ofast)
endif()
if(CMAKE_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
else()
    target_compile_options(NBT PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(CMAKE_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET NBT PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDLL")
endif()
target_link_libraries(NBT PRIVATE
    BinaryStream
    zlib
)
target_link_directories(NBT PRIVATE
    C:/Users/mcwit/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/b/binarystream/2.3.2/8e3d87e137954c31b6acdb2d78a3e28f/lib
    C:/Users/mcwit/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/z/zlib/v1.3.1/95786712bac941e795afa187a68143a4/lib
)
target_sources(NBT PRIVATE
    src/nbt/detail/CompressionUtils.cpp
    src/nbt/detail/FileUtils.cpp
    src/nbt/detail/SnbtDeserializer.cpp
    src/nbt/detail/SnbtSerializer.cpp
    src/nbt/detail/StringUtils.cpp
    src/nbt/detail/Validate.cpp
    src/nbt/io/BytesDataInput.cpp
    src/nbt/io/BytesDataOutput.cpp
    src/nbt/io/NBTIO.cpp
    src/nbt/NBT.cpp
    src/nbt/types/ByteArrayTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/ByteTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/CompoundTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/CompoundTagVariant.cpp
    src/nbt/types/DoubleTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/EndTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/FloatTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/IntArrayTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/IntTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/ListTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/LongArrayTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/LongTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/NbtContent.cpp
    src/nbt/types/NbtFile.cpp
    src/nbt/types/ShortTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/StringTag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/Tag.cpp
    src/nbt/types/TypedNbt.cpp
    src/nbt-c/NBT.cpp
)
